name: aspnet.vim--Abshire
description: Provides ASP.NET syntax highlighting. This is a modified version of the aspnet.vim file provided my Mark Feeney, to better handle a few things, such as the following: "/>
install_details:
Copy this script to ~/.vim/syntax
Create the file ~/.vim/ftdetect/aspnet.vim

~/.vim/ftdetect/aspnet.vim
-------------------------------------
au BufRead,BufNewFile *.aspx,*.asmx,*.ascx      set filetype=aspnet
-------------------------------------
